channel.title: Greg's ezlogin

item.title: Greg's ezlogin
item.dc:creator: @Greg_the_Xeno Greg the Xeno
item.description:
@Greg_the_Xeno wrote:

My first script. Whipped it up in 5 seconds. Please enjoy. I am planning to create Skilling scripts in the future but iâ€™m still learning atm.

{
Greg's EZlogin version 0.1

____Note: I am pretty confident it will not get you banned anytime soon.____

Instructions:
1. Setup your Username and Password.
2. Target Runescape or Implement SMART. 
3. Run the script.
}

program EZlogin;

{.include SRL\SRL.SCAR}

Var
    x, y: Integer;

const
username = 'user';  //Username 
password = 'pass';  //Password


  
procedure LogIn;
  begin
    mouse(380, 184, 6, 3, true);
     wait(500+random(300));
    TypeSend(username);
     wait(700+random(400));
    TypeSend(password);
  end;


begin
  SetupSRL;
    repeat
      wait(500+random(500)); 
    until(findColor(x, y, 11185067, 299, 276, 314, 312)) //Looks for "SD" button color:11185067.
  LogIn;
end.

EDIT: Thought I posted in first scripts, Sorry bout that.
